615254.Name: Self-Manifestation
615254.Effect: Reduces DEF of Enemies with their Weakness Broken by <color=#f29e38ff>15%</color>.
615254.AbridgedEffect: Enemies with their Weakness Broken have their DEF reduced.
615254.EnhancedEffect: Reduces DEF of Enemies with their Weakness Broken by <color=#f29e38ff>20%</color>.
615254.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: Enemies with their Weakness Broken have their DEF reduced.

615255.Name: Emotional Decluttering
615255.Effect: Every time an enemy target is afflicted with a DoT status, the DMG taken by them increases by <color=#f29e38ff>3%</color>. This effect can stack up to <color=#f29e38ff>4</color> time(s).
615255.AbridgedEffect: The more DoTs the enemy has, the more DMG they will receive from all sources.
615255.EnhancedEffect: Every time an enemy target is afflicted with a DoT status, the DMG taken by them increases by <color=#f29e38ff>4%</color>. This effect can stack up to <color=#f29e38ff>5</color> time(s).
615255.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: The more DoTs the enemy has, the more DMG they will receive from all sources.

615256.Name: Offerings of Deception
615256.Effect: Every time an enemy takes DMG from a DoT, all allies restore HP equal to <color=#f29e38ff>1.0%</color> of their respective Max HP.
615256.AbridgedEffect: Every time an enemy takes DMG from a DoT, all characters restore HP.
615256.EnhancedEffect: Every time an enemy takes DMG from a DoT, all allies restore HP equal to <color=#f29e38ff>1.5%</color> of their respective Max HP.
615256.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: Every time an enemy takes DMG from a DoT, all characters restore HP.

615257.Name: Before Sunrise
615257.Effect: Every time an enemy receives a DoT, regenerates <color=#f29e38ff>2.0</color> Energy for a random ally. Enemies can trigger this effect for a max of <color=#f29e38ff>20</color> time(s) in one turn.
615257.AbridgedEffect: Every time an enemy takes DMG from a DoT, a random ally regenerates Energy.
615257.EnhancedEffect: Every time an enemy receives a DoT, regenerates <color=#f29e38ff>3.0</color> Energy for a random ally. Enemies can trigger this effect for a max of <color=#f29e38ff>20</color> time(s) in one turn.
615257.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: Every time an enemy takes DMG from a DoT, a random ally regenerates Energy.

615320.Name: Elixir Seekers
615320.Effect: Spend 100 points of Energy to use the ability and achieve Boundary Resonance with the Path of Abundance, restoring HP for all allies by <color=#f29e38ff>100%</color> of the triggering character's Max HP, dispelling all debuffs, and applying <u>Purgatorial Eradication</u>, lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>3</color> turn(s).
615320.AbridgedEffect: After triggering the boundary Equation, restores HP for all allies and dispels all debuffs while providing the <u>Purgatorial Eradication</u> state.

615330.Name: Perennial Prosperity, Lush Longevity
615330.Effect: Charges <u>Dewdrop</u> when a character's HP is restored. The Charge value is equal to <color=#f29e38ff>100%</color> of the amount of healing received.
615330.AbridgedEffect: When a character's HP is restored, <u>Dewdrop</u> is Charged according to the amount of healing received.
615330.EnhancedEffect: Charges <u>Dewdrop</u> when a character's HP is restored. The Charge value is equal to <color=#f29e38ff>100%</color> of the amount of healing received, and increases <u>Dewdrop</u>'s DMG multiplier by <color=#f29e38ff>40%</color> of the original multiplier.
615330.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: When a character's HP is restored, <u>Dewdrop</u> is Charged according to the amount of healing received, and DMG done by <u>Dewdrop</u> is increased.

615331.Name: Mudra of Blessing
615331.Effect: Charges <u>Dewdrop</u> at the beginning of a character's turn. The Charge value is equal to <color=#f29e38ff>60%</color> of their current HP.
615331.AbridgedEffect: When a character's turn begins, <u>Dewdrop</u> is Charged based on the character's current HP.
615331.EnhancedEffect: Charges <u>Dewdrop</u> at the beginning of a character's turn. The Charge value is equal to <color=#f29e38ff>70%</color> of their Max HP.
615331.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: When a character's turn begins, <u>Dewdrop</u> is Charged based on the character's Max HP.

615332.Name: All Abundance in One Mind
615332.Effect: When a character provides healing, allies other than the healed target will also gain HP equal to <color=#f29e38ff>30%</color> of the Outgoing Healing.
615332.AbridgedEffect: Healing effects provided by characters can be Blasted to all allies.
615332.EnhancedEffect: Characters' Max HP increases by <color=#f29e38ff>20%</color>. When a character provides healing, allies other than the healed target will also gain HP equal to <color=#f29e38ff>35%</color> of the Outgoing Healing.
615332.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: Increases Max HP. Healing effects provided by characters can be Blasted to all allies.

615340.Name: Sin Dead, Grace Born
615340.Effect: Restores HP to the character equal to <color=#f29e38ff>20%</color> of the Charge value when <u>Dewdrop</u> ruptures, up to <color=#f29e38ff>18%</color> of the character's Max HP.
615340.AbridgedEffect: Restores the character's HP when <u>Dewdrop</u> breaks.
615340.EnhancedEffect: Restores HP equal to <color=#f29e38ff>20%</color> of the Charge value when <u>Dewdrop</u> ruptures, up to <color=#f29e38ff>24%</color> of the character's Max HP and no less than <color=#f29e38ff>12%</color> of their Max HP.
615340.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: Restores the character's HP to above a minimum value when <u>Dewdrop</u> breaks.

615341.Name: The Blessed Many
615341.Effect: When a character's HP is full, increases the Charging Efficiency for <u>Dewdrop</u> by <color=#f29e38ff>80%</color>.
615341.AbridgedEffect: When a character's HP is full, <u>Dewdrop</u>'s Charging Efficiency increases.
615341.EnhancedEffect: When a character's HP is full, increases the Charging Efficiency for <u>Dewdrop</u> by <color=#f29e38ff>120%</color>.
615341.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: When a character's HP is full, <u>Dewdrop</u>'s Charging Efficiency increases.

615342.Name: Candlelight Radiance
615342.Effect: When a character provides healing to allies, increases the ATK of both units by <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color> for <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> turn(s).
615342.AbridgedEffect: When a character restores an ally's HP, both units' ATK increases.
615342.EnhancedEffect: When a character provides healing to allies, increases the ATK of all allies by <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color> for <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> turn(s).
615342.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: When a character restores an ally's HP, all allies' ATK increases.

615343.Name: Bitter Is the Bane
615343.Effect: After launching attacks, characters deal Additional DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>36%</color> of their current HP.
615343.AbridgedEffect: After a character uses an attack, they deal Additional DMG based on their current HP.
615343.EnhancedEffect: Whenever a character attacks, deals Additional DMG to the enemy equal to <color=#f29e38ff>42%</color> of the character's Max HP.
615343.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: After a character uses an attack, they deal Additional DMG based on their Max HP.

615344.Name: Corporeal Pellucidity
615344.Effect: When a character's HP is fully restored, reduces their DMG received by <color=#f29e38ff>25%</color> and increases Effect RES by <color=#f29e38ff>15%</color> until after they are attacked.
615344.AbridgedEffect: When a character's HP is fully restored, their DMG received is reduced and Effect RES is increased until after they are attacked.
615344.EnhancedEffect: When a character's HP is fully restored, reduces their DMG received by <color=#f29e38ff>30%</color> and increases Effect RES by <color=#f29e38ff>30%</color> until after they are attacked.
615344.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: When a character's HP is fully restored, their DMG received is reduced and Effect RES is increased until after they are attacked.

615345.Name: Prajna Voyage
615345.Effect: When being healed by an ally, characters restore extra HP equal to <color=#f29e38ff>30%</color> of the amount of HP healed.
615345.AbridgedEffect: Characters that have their HP restored by an ally also restore extra HP.
615345.EnhancedEffect: When being healed by an ally, characters restore extra HP equal to <color=#f29e38ff>45%</color> of the amount of HP healed.
615345.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: Characters that have their HP restored by an ally also restore extra HP.

615350.Name: Dharma Rain
615350.Effect: When a character's restored HP exceeds their Max HP, increases their Max HP by <color=#f29e38ff>24%</color>, lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> turn(s).
615350.AbridgedEffect: When a character's restored HP exceeds Max HP, their Max HP increases.
615350.EnhancedEffect: When a character's restored HP exceeds their Max HP, increases their Max HP by <color=#f29e38ff>36%</color>, lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> turn(s).
615350.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: When a character's restored HP exceeds Max HP, their Max HP increases.

615351.Name: Dew Delight
615351.AbridgedEffect: Increases the amount of HP restored by characters.
615351.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: Increases the amount of HP restored by characters.

615352.Name: Extended Life
615352.Effect: When a character has their HP lowered to below <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color> for the first time in battle, they restore HP equal to <color=#f29e38ff>30%</color> of their Max HP.
615352.AbridgedEffect: When a character has their HP lowered to below <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color> for the first time, their HP is restored.
615352.EnhancedEffect: When a character has their HP lowered to below <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color> for the first time in battle, they restore HP equal to <color=#f29e38ff>45%</color> of their Max HP.
615352.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: When a character has their HP lowered to below <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color> for the first time, their HP is restored.

615353.Name: Mudra
615353.Effect: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, restores HP to the character equal to <color=#f29e38ff>16%</color> of their Max HP.
615353.AbridgedEffect: Characters restore HP after inflicting Weakness Break on enemies.
615353.EnhancedEffect: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, restores HP to the character equal to <color=#f29e38ff>24%</color> of their Max HP.
615353.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: Characters restore HP after inflicting Weakness Break on enemies.

615354.Name: Peril Parry
615354.Effect: After a character is healed, increases their DEF by <color=#f29e38ff>24%</color> for <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> turn(s).
615354.AbridgedEffect: After having their HP restored, the character's DEF increases.
615354.EnhancedEffect: After a character is healed, increases their DEF by <color=#f29e38ff>36%</color> for <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> turn(s).
615354.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: After having their HP restored, the character's DEF increases.

615355.Name: Back to Life
615355.Effect: After a character provides healing, they restore HP equal to <color=#f29e38ff>12%</color> of their Max HP. This effect can only trigger once per action.
615355.AbridgedEffect: After restoring an ally's HP, the healer character also restores HP.
615355.EnhancedEffect: After a character provides healing, they restore HP equal to <color=#f29e38ff>18%</color> of their Max HP. This effect can only trigger once per action.
615355.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: After restoring an ally's HP, the healer character also restores HP.

615356.Name: Force Victoire
615356.Effect: After a character is healed, increases their SPD by <color=#f29e38ff>10%</color> for <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> turn(s).
615356.AbridgedEffect: After having their HP restored, the character's SPD increases.
615356.EnhancedEffect: After a character is healed, increases their SPD by <color=#f29e38ff>15%</color> for <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> turn(s).
615356.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: After having their HP restored, the character's SPD increases.

615357.Name: Anointment
615357.Effect: When a character's restored HP exceeds their Max HP, there's a <color=#f29e38ff>25%</color> fixed chance to dispel 1 debuff on the character. This effect can be triggered up to <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> time(s) per turn.
615357.AbridgedEffect: When a character's restored HP exceeds their Max HP, there is a chance to dispel 1 debuff currently on them.
615357.EnhancedEffect: When a character's restored HP exceeds their Max HP, there's a <color=#f29e38ff>25%</color> fixed chance to dispel 1 debuff on the character. This effect can be triggered up to <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> time(s) per turn.
615357.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: When a character's restored HP exceeds their Max HP, there is a chance to dispel 1 debuff currently on them.

615420.Name: Galaxy Ranger
615420.Effect: Spends 100 points of Energy to use the ability and achieve Boundary Resonance with the Path of The Hunt, dealing Wind DMG to all enemies and Advances all allies' actions by <color=#f29e38ff>100%</color>, with the Max Energy being 200.
615420.AbridgedEffect: After triggering the boundary Equation, deals Wind DMG to all enemies and Advances all allies' actions by <color=#f29e38ff>100%</color>, with the Max Energy being 200.

615430.Name: Empyrean Imperium
615430.Effect: When a character's turn begins, they gain <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> stack(s) of <u>Critical Boost</u>.
615430.AbridgedEffect: When a character's turn begins, they gain <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> stack(s) of <u>Critical Boost</u>.
615430.EnhancedEffect: When a character's turn begins, they gain <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> stack(s) of <u>Critical Boost</u> and sets the stack limit of <u>Critical Boost</u> to <color=#f29e38ff>12</color>.
615430.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: When a character's turn begins, they gain <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> stack(s) of <u>Critical Boost</u> and raises the stack limit of <u>Critical Boost</u>.

615431.Name: Radiant Supreme
615431.Effect: After a character defeats an enemy, their action is Advanced Forward by 100%. At the beginning of the next turn, they gain <color=#f29e38ff>4</color> stack(s) of <u>Critical Boost</u>.
615431.AbridgedEffect: After defeating an enemy, the character's action is Advanced Forward by 100%. At the beginning of the next turn, they gain <color=#f29e38ff>4</color> stack(s) of <u>Critical Boost</u>.
615431.EnhancedEffect: After a character defeats an enemy, their action is Advanced Forward by 100%. At the beginning of the next turn, they gain <color=#f29e38ff>7</color> stack(s) of <u>Critical Boost</u>.
615431.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: After defeating an enemy, the character's action is Advanced Forward by 100%. At the beginning of the next turn, they gain <color=#f29e38ff>7</color> stack(s) of <u>Critical Boost</u>.

615432.Name: Sovereign Skybreaker
615432.Effect: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, their action Advances Forward by 100% and increases the DMG dealt by their next attack by <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color>.
615432.AbridgedEffect: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, their action Advances Forward by 100% and increases the DMG dealt by their next attack.
615432.EnhancedEffect: After a character Breaks enemy targets' Weakness, their action Advances Forward by 100% and the DMG they deal increases by <color=#f29e38ff>75%</color>. The DMG Boost effect stacks up to <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> time(s) and lasts until the character is attacked.
615432.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, their action Advances Forward by 100% and their DMG dealt increases. The DMG Boost effect can stack and lasts until the character is attacked.

615440.Name: Skyward Vendetta
615440.Effect: If a character has higher than 100% CRIT Rate and has the <u>Critical Boost</u> status, for every 1% CRIT Rate that exceeds 100%, CRIT DMG increases by <color=#f29e38ff>3%</color>. CRIT DMG can be increased this way by up to <color=#f29e38ff>150%</color>.
615440.AbridgedEffect: When a character has <u>Critical Boost</u>, their excess CRIT Rate turns into CRIT DMG.
615440.EnhancedEffect: If a character has higher than 100% CRIT Rate and has the <u>Critical Boost</u> status, for every 1% CRIT Rate that exceeds 100%, CRIT DMG increases by <color=#f29e38ff>3%</color>. CRIT DMG can be increased this way by up to <color=#f29e38ff>240%</color>.
615440.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: When a character has <u>Critical Boost</u>, their excess CRIT Rate turns into CRIT DMG.

615441.Name: Adept's Bow
615441.Effect: When any ally uses their Ultimate, they can inherit <u>Critical Boost</u>, and the number of <u>Critical Boost</u> stacks increases by <color=#f29e38ff>1</color>.
615441.AbridgedEffect: Ultimates can inherit and increase <u>Critical Boost</u> stacks.
615441.EnhancedEffect: When any ally uses their Ultimate or performs a follow-up attack, they can inherit <u>Critical Boost</u>, and the number of <u>Critical Boost</u> stacks increases by <color=#f29e38ff>1</color>.
615441.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: Follow-up attacks and Ultimates can inherit and increase <u>Critical Boost</u> stacks.

615442.Name: Mistwraith Pursuit
615442.Effect: When the same character acts consecutively, their ATK increases by <color=#f29e38ff>40%</color>. This effect can stack up to <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> time(s).
615442.AbridgedEffect: When the same character acts consecutively, their ATK increases.
615442.EnhancedEffect: When the same character acts consecutively, their ATK increases by <color=#f29e38ff>40%</color>. This effect can stack up to <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> times and gives a <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color> fixed chance to recover 1 Skill Point. This effect cannot be triggered repeatedly.
615442.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: When the same character acts consecutively, their ATK increases, and there's a chance of recovering a Skill Point.

615443.Name: Starward Demonhunt
615443.Effect: After a character launches an attack, reduces their DMG taken by <color=#f29e38ff>12%</color>. This effect stacks up to <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> time(s) and lasts until character is attacked.
615443.AbridgedEffect: After a character launches an attack, reduces DMG taken by them. This effect can stack and lasts until the character is attacked.
615443.EnhancedEffect: After a character launches an attack, reduces their DMG taken by <color=#f29e38ff>12%</color>. This effect stacks up to <color=#f29e38ff>3</color> time(s) and lasts until character is attacked.
615443.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: After a character launches an attack, reduces DMG taken by them. This effect can stack and lasts until the character is attacked.

615444.Name: Borisin Chase
615444.Effect: After every <color=#f29e38ff>6</color> turn(s) conducted by all allies, the current character's action is Advanced Forward by 100%. The effect cannot be triggered repeatedly by the same character.
615444.AbridgedEffect: Every time a certain number of turns had passed, the current character's action is Advanced Forward by 100%.
615444.EnhancedEffect: After every <color=#f29e38ff>6</color> turn(s) conducted by all allies, the current character's action is Advanced Forward by 100%. The effect cannot be triggered repeatedly by the same character. Upon entering battle, <color=#f29e38ff>5</color> turn(s) are considered to have already passed.
615444.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: Every time a certain number of turns had passed, the current character's action is Advanced Forward by 100%. Upon entering a battle, a certain number of turns is considered to have already passed.

615445.Name: Rainbow Fang
615445.Effect: When a character defeats an enemy, restores all allies' HP equal to <color=#f29e38ff>30%</color> of their respective Max HP and increases their ATK by <color=#f29e38ff>25%</color>, lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> turn(s).
615445.AbridgedEffect: After a character defeats an enemy, restores all allies' HP and increases their ATK.
615445.EnhancedEffect: When a character defeats an enemy, restores all allies' HP equal to <color=#f29e38ff>45%</color> of their respective Max HP and increases their ATK by <color=#f29e38ff>45%</color>, lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> turn(s).
615445.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: After a character defeats an enemy, restores all allies' HP and increases their ATK.

615453.Name: Thundering Chariot
615453.Effect: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, delays the enemy's action by <color=#f29e38ff>20%</color>.
615453.AbridgedEffect: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, the enemy's action is delayed.
615453.EnhancedEffect: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, delays the enemy's action by <color=#f29e38ff>30%</color>.
615453.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, the enemy's action is delayed.

615454.Name: Constellation Surge
615454.Effect: After characters Break an enemy's Weakness, increases their SPD by <color=#f29e38ff>30%</color>, lasting until the character is attacked.
615454.AbridgedEffect: After a character Breaks an enemy's Weakness, SPD increases. Lasts until the character is attacked.
615454.EnhancedEffect: After characters Break an enemy's Weakness, increases their SPD by <color=#f29e38ff>45%</color>, lasting until the character is attacked.
615454.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: After a character Breaks an enemy's Weakness, SPD increases. Lasts until the character is attacked.

615455.Name: Astral Menace
615455.Effect: At the end of a character's turn, their next action is Advanced Forward by <color=#f29e38ff>8%</color>.
615455.AbridgedEffect: When a character's turn ends, their action is Advanced Forward.
615455.EnhancedEffect: At the end of a character's turn, their next action is Advanced Forward by <color=#f29e38ff>12%</color>.
615455.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: When a character's turn ends, their action is Advanced Forward.

615456.Name: Arboreal Volley
615456.Effect: At the beginning of a character's turn, they regenerate <color=#f29e38ff>4</color> Energy.
615456.AbridgedEffect: When a character's turn begins, regenerate their Energy.
615456.EnhancedEffect: At the beginning of a character's turn, they regenerate <color=#f29e38ff>6</color> Energy.
615456.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: When a character's turn begins, regenerate their Energy.

615457.Name: Arrow Shades Bow
615457.Effect: At the beginning of a character's turn, receives an ATK boost equal to <color=#f29e38ff>10%</color> of the last-acting ally's ATK. This will last until the next turn starts.
615457.AbridgedEffect: When a character's turn begins after an ally has completed their turn, increase ATK based on the previous ally who had acted.
615457.EnhancedEffect: At the beginning of a character's turn, receives an ATK boost equal to <color=#f29e38ff>15%</color> of the last-acting ally's ATK. This will last until the next turn starts.
615457.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: When a character's turn begins after an ally has completed their turn, increase ATK based on the previous ally who had acted.

615520.Name: Antimatter Legion
615520.Effect: Spend 100 points of Energy to use the ability and achieve Boundary Resonance with the Path of Destruction, dealing Fire DMG to all enemies. Whenever a character is attacked or loses HP, they will gain an additional hit of DMG the next time the Boundary Resonance is triggered, up to <color=#f29e38ff>20</color> hits.
615520.AbridgedEffect: After triggering the boundary Equation, deals Fire DMG to all enemies. Whenever a character is attacked or loses HP, they will gain an additional hit of DMG next time.

615530.Name: Quasar Meltdown Constant
615530.Effect: Every time a character loses or heals <color=#f29e38ff>20%</color> of their HP, obtain <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> stack(s) of the <u>Grit</u> effect, with up to <color=#f29e38ff>8</color> stacks can be obtained each turn. When the total HP lost or restoration equals to <color=#f29e38ff>100%</color> of HP, increases the character's Break Effect by <color=#f29e38ff>30%</color>.
615530.AbridgedEffect: For every certain percentage of HP that characters lose or heal themselves by, they gain <u>Grit</u>. After cumulatively losing or healing by a certain amount of HP, Break Effect is increased.
615530.EnhancedEffect: Every time a character loses or heals <color=#f29e38ff>16%</color> of their HP, obtain <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> stack(s) of the <u>Grit</u> effect, with up to <color=#f29e38ff>12</color> stacks can be obtained each turn. When the total HP lost or restoration equals to <color=#f29e38ff>100%</color> of HP, increases the character's Break Effect by <color=#f29e38ff>45%</color>.
615530.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: For every certain percentage of HP that characters lose or heal themselves by, they gain <u>Grit</u>. After cumulatively losing or healing by a certain amount of HP, Break Effect is increased.

615531.Name: Boundary Density Expansion Group
615531.Effect: Every time a character loses or heals HP, they gain <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> stack(s) of the <u>Grit</u> effect. This effect can be triggered up to 1 time for each attack taken.
615531.AbridgedEffect: Every time a character loses HP or heals themselves, they gain <u>Grit</u>.
615531.EnhancedEffect: Every time a character loses or has HP restored, they gain <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> stack(s) of the <u>Grit</u> effect and randomly grants <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> of their other teammates <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> stack(s) of the <u>Grit</u> effect. This effect can be triggered up to 1 time for each attack taken.
615531.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: Every time a character loses HP or heals themselves, they gain <u>Grit</u> and grant random allies <u>Grit</u>.

615532.Name: Regression Inequality of Annihilation
615532.Effect: When player characters are hit, DMG taken by the characters is distributed among all allies.
615532.EnhancedEffect: Receives <color=#f29e38ff>15%</color> less DMG. When player characters are hit, DMG taken by the characters is distributed among all allies.
615532.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: All allies split incoming DMG, and reduces the DMG taken by targeted character.

615540.Name: Catastrophic Resonance
615540.Effect: When characters with <u>Grit</u> use their Basic ATK/Skill/Ultimate to deal DMG, increases DMG taken by enemies by <color=#f29e38ff>10%</color>. When <u>Grit</u> reaches more than <color=#f29e38ff>10</color> stacks, additionally increases Break DMG taken by enemies by <color=#f29e38ff>30%</color>.

When <u>Grit</u> reaches more than <color=#f29e38ff>10</color> stacks, additionally increases Break DMG taken by enemies by <color=#f29e38ff>45%</color>.

615620.Name: Masked Fools

615756.EnhancedEffect: For each Skill Point a character consumes, the character regenerates <color=#f29e38ff>4</color> extra Energy.

615757.EnhancedEffect: For each Skill Point a character consumes, the character restores HP equal to <color=#f29e38ff>15%</color> of their Max HP.
615757.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: Characters restore HP when consuming Skill Points

615820.Name: Astral Ecology School
615820.Effect: Spend 100 points of Energy to use the ability and achieve Boundary Resonance with the Path of Erudition. Deals minor Imaginary DMG to all enemies. Additionally, links the enemy with the highest Max HP with other enemies, inflicting <u>Central Link</u> on all enemies and regenerating Energy equal to <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color> of Max Energy to all allies.
615820.AbridgedEffect: After triggering the boundary Equation, deals Imaginary DMG to all enemies and inflicts the <u>Central Link</u> effect on them, regenerating Energy for all allies.

615830.Name: BCI<unbreak>-34</unbreak> Gray Matter
615830.Effect: When entering battle, charges the <u>Brain in a Vat</u> by <color=#f29e38ff>65%</color>. Breaking an enemy's Weakness charges the <u>Brain in a Vat</u> by <color=#f29e38ff>35%</color>.
615830.AbridgedEffect: When entering battle, charges the <u>Brain in a Vat</u>. Breaking an enemy's Weakness charges the <u>Brain in a Vat</u>.
615830.EnhancedEffect: When entering battle, charges <u>Brain in a Vat</u> by <color=#f29e38ff>100%</color>. Breaking an enemy's Weakness or attacking Weakness Broken enemies will charge <u>Brain in a Vat</u> by <color=#f29e38ff>40%</color> or <color=#f29e38ff>5%</color> respectively. This effect can only be triggered once by each enemy during each attack.
615830.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: When entering battle, charges the <u>Brain in a Vat</u>. Breaking an enemy's Weakness or attacking Weakness Broken enemies charges the <u>Brain in a Vat</u>.

615831.Name: SMR-2 Amygdala
615831.Effect: Dealing fatal DMG to enemies will charge the <u>Brain in a Vat</u> by <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color>.
615831.AbridgedEffect: Dealing fatal DMG to enemies charges the <u>Brain in a Vat</u>.
615831.EnhancedEffect: Dealing fatal DMG to enemies charges the <u>Brain in a Vat</u> by <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color>. When the <u>Brain in a Vat</u> is fully charged, characters' SPD increases by <color=#f29e38ff>20%</color> for <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> turn(s).
615831.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: Dealing fatal DMG to enemies charges the <u>Brain in a Vat</u>. Every time the <u>Brain in a Vat</u> is fully charged, gains a SPD bonus.

615832.Name: VEP<unbreak>-18</unbreak> Occipital Lobe
615832.Effect: The All-Type RES PEN for characters' Ultimate DMG increases by <color=#f29e38ff>20%</color>. After an Ultimate is used, for every enemy target that is hit by this Ultimate, the All-Type RES PEN for the Ultimate DMG dealt will additionally increase by <color=#f29e38ff>3%</color>. This effect lasts until the next time an Ultimate is used.
615832.AbridgedEffect: Increases the All-Type RES PEN for characters' Ultimate DMG. The more enemy targets the Ultimate attacks, the greater the increase in the All-Type RES PEN for the Ultimate DMG, lasting until the next time the Ultimate is used.
615832.EnhancedEffect: The All-Type RES PEN for characters' Ultimate DMG increases by <color=#f29e38ff>25%</color>. For each enemy target hit by the Ultimate that achieves the highest number of enemy hits in a single attack in this battle, the All-Type RES PEN for Ultimate DMG dealt additionally increases by <color=#f29e38ff>3%</color>.
615832.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: Increases the All-Type RES PEN for characters' Ultimate DMG. In this battle, the bigger the maximum number of enemy targets an Ultimate hits in a single attack, the greater the increase in the All-Type RES PEN for the Ultimate DMG.

615840.Name: Attachment: Vestibular System
615840.Effect: When characters use Ultimates via <u>Brain in a Vat</u>, their CRIT DMG increases by <color=#f29e38ff>80%</color>, lasting until this ability ends.
615840.AbridgedEffect: Ultimate cast with the <u>Brain in a Vat</u> deals more CRIT DMG.
615840.EnhancedEffect: When characters use Ultimates via <u>Brain in a Vat</u>, their CRIT DMG increases by <color=#f29e38ff>90%</color>. This CRIT DMG increase lasts until the next attack ends.
615840.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: Ultimates cast with the <u>Brain in a Vat</u> deals more CRIT DMG. This CRIT DMG bonus lasts until the end of the next ATK.

615841.Name: Implant: Explicit Memory
615841.Effect: After characters use their Ultimate via <u>Brain in a Vat</u>, they gain a Shield equal in strength to <color=#f29e38ff>36%</color> of their Max HP, lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> turns.
615841.AbridgedEffect: Gains Shield when using an Ultimate via the <u>Brain in a Vat</u>.
615841.EnhancedEffect: After characters use their Ultimate via <u>Brain in a Vat</u>, they gain a Shield equal in strength to <color=#f29e38ff>45%</color> of their Max HP, lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>3</color> turns.
615841.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: Gains Shield when using an Ultimate via the <u>Brain in a Vat</u>.

615842.Name: Mimesis: Tactile Pathway
615842.Effect: After characters use an attack, they deal Additional DMG to the attacked enemy target(s). For every enemy target that was attacked, increase Additional DMG by <color=#f29e38ff>15%</color> of the character's ATK.
615842.AbridgedEffect: After characters use an attack, deal additional DMG based on the number of enemies attacked.
615842.EnhancedEffect: After characters use an attack, they deal Additional DMG to the attacked enemy target(s). For every enemy target that was attacked, increase Additional DMG by <color=#f29e38ff>20%</color> of the character's ATK. Up to 5 enemies that have been defeated in the current battle will also be regarded as having been attacked.
615842.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: After characters use an attack, deal additional DMG based on the number of enemies attacked and the number of enemies defeated during the entire battle.

615843.Name: Analysis: Subliminal Sensation
615843.Effect: Characters' Ultimate DMG increases by <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color>, lasting until the end of the first Ultimate they use in battle. Upon entering battle, characters regenerate energy equal to <color=#f29e38ff>60%</color> of their respective Max Energy.
615843.AbridgedEffect: Ultimate DMG is increased the first time a character deals Ultimate DMG. Regenerates Energy upon entering battle.
615843.EnhancedEffect: Characters' Ultimate DMG increases by <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color>. Upon entering battle, regenerates energy equal to <color=#f29e38ff>100%</color> of the character's Max Energy.
615843.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: Increase Ultimate DMG dealt by characters. Regenerates Energy upon entering battle.

615844.Name: Load: Striated Cortex
615844.Effect: If characters' <u>AoE ATK</u> ability only attacks 1 enemy, this ATK will deal an additional set amount of DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>40%</color> of the original DMG to the attacked enemy target.
615844.AbridgedEffect: If characters' <u>AoE</u> ability only attacks one enemy, the ability deals a set amount of extra DMG based on the original ability DMG.
615844.EnhancedEffect: If characters' <u>AoE ATK</u> ability only attacks 1 enemy, this ATK will deal an additional set amount of DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>60%</color> of the original DMG to the attacked enemy target.
615844.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: If characters' <u>AoE</u> ability only attacks one enemy, the ability deals a set amount of extra DMG based on the original ability DMG.

615845.Name: Stimulation: Saltatory Conduction
615845.Effect: When characters use their Ultimate to attack enemies that are Weakness Broken, delay the enemy's action by <color=#f29e38ff>16%</color>. Every time the enemy target becomes Weakness Broken, this effect can be triggered up to <color=#f29e38ff>3</color> times.
615845.AbridgedEffect: Ultimate attacks delay all Weakness Broken enemies' actions.
615845.EnhancedEffect: When characters use their Ultimate to attack enemies that are Weakness Broken, delay the enemy's action by <color=#f29e38ff>24%</color>. Every time the enemy target becomes Weakness Broken, this effect can be triggered up to <color=#f29e38ff>3</color> times.
615845.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: Ultimate attacks delay all Weakness Broken enemies' actions.

615850.Name: Throne of Engaged Gears
615850.Effect: Increases characters' Ultimate DMG dealt by <color=#f29e38ff>18%</color>.
615850.EnhancedEffect: Increases characters' Ultimate DMG dealt by <color=#f29e38ff>27%</color>.

615851.Name: Ring of Bent Wires
615851.Effect: Characters' Ultimate CRIT Rate increases by <color=#f29e38ff>18%</color>.
615851.EnhancedEffect: Characters' Ultimate CRIT Rate increases by <color=#f29e38ff>27%</color>.

615852.Name: Scepter of Energy Torque
615852.Effect: Characters' Ultimate CRIT DMG increases by <color=#f29e38ff>30%</color>.
615852.EnhancedEffect: Characters' Ultimate CRIT DMG increases by <color=#f29e38ff>45%</color>.

615853.Name: Torch of Anti-Lag Ignition
615853.Effect: After characters use their Ultimate, their next attack will deal <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color> more DMG.
615853.AbridgedEffect: Increases the DMG of the characters' next attack following their Ultimate.
615853.EnhancedEffect: After characters use their Ultimate, their next attack will deal <color=#f29e38ff>75%</color> more DMG.
615853.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: Increases the DMG of the characters' next attack following their Ultimate.

615854.Name: Ion-Thruster Sword
615854.Effect: When characters use their Ultimate, their ATK increases by <color=#f29e38ff>24%</color>, lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> turn(s).
615854.AbridgedEffect: Characters' ATK increases when using Ultimate.
615854.EnhancedEffect: When characters use their Ultimate, their ATK increases by <color=#f29e38ff>36%</color>, lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> turn(s).
615854.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: Characters' ATK increases when using Ultimate.

615855.Name: Steel Forged Ribbon
615855.Effect: After a character launches an attack, increase Max HP by <color=#f29e38ff>5.0%</color> for every enemy target attacked to a maximum of <color=#f29e38ff>5</color> time(s). This effect lasts until the start of the next turn.
615855.AbridgedEffect: The more enemies a character attacks, the higher their Max HP increases. The effect lasts until the start of the next turn.
615855.EnhancedEffect: After a character launches an attack, increase Max HP by <color=#f29e38ff>7.5%</color> for every enemy target attacked to a maximum of <color=#f29e38ff>5</color> time(s). This effect lasts until the start of the next turn.
615855.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: The more enemies a character attacks, the higher their Max HP increases. The effect lasts until the start of the next turn.

615856.Name: Garment of Coiled Wires
615856.Effect: After characters use their Ultimate, they restore HP equal to <color=#f29e38ff>16%</color> of their Max HP.
615856.AbridgedEffect: Characters restore HP after using their Ultimate.
615856.EnhancedEffect: After characters use their Ultimate, they restore HP equal to <color=#f29e38ff>24%</color> of their Max HP.
615856.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: Characters restore HP after using their Ultimate.

615857.Name: Wreath of Interlaced Pipes
615857.Effect: When struck with a killing blow, characters will not be knocked down and will instead consume all their Energy, then restore HP equal to <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color> of the consumed Energy. This effect can only be triggered once per battle for the whole team.
615857.AbridgedEffect: Characters can resist fatal DMG and can consume Energy to restore their own HP. This can take effect a limited number of times among all allies.
615857.EnhancedEffect: When struck with a killing blow, characters will not be knocked down and will instead consume all their Energy, then restore HP equal to <color=#f29e38ff>100%</color> of the consumed Energy. This effect can only be triggered once per battle for the whole team.
615857.EnhancedAbridgedEffect: Characters can resist fatal DMG and can consume Energy to restore their own HP. This can take effect a limited number of times among all allies.

670010.Name: City Restorer
670010.Effect: Comet Nucleus appears in the Action Order: Each time it takes a turn, absorbs all allies' Shields, reducing their values to 1 and turning the absorbed values into its own Shield. Afterward, it deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>2500%</color> of this value to all enemies, with a <color=#f29e38ff>75%</color> base chance to Freeze enemies for <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> turn(s). When characters take damage, Comet Nucleus's Shield will be consumed first. When characters deal <u>Quake</u> DMG, <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color> of Comet Nucleus's Shield will be considered as the character's Shield.
670010.AbridgedEffect: A Comet Nucleus appears in the Action Order to block DMG for the team. During its action, it absorbs Shields from allies to deal Physical DMG to all enemies, with a chance to Freeze them.

670140.Name: Silent Hunter
670140.Effect: When enemy targets enter battle, there is a <color=#f29e38ff>100%</color> base chance for them to be inflicted with <u>Dissociation</u> that lasts for <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> turn(s). Enemies in <u>Dissociation</u> will resist all DMG, and all CRIT DMG and Break DMG taken are tallied. When the effect is dispelled, additionally deals a set amount of CRIT DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>150%</color> of the tallied value to all enemies. When the tallied value reaches <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color> of the target's Max HP, <u>Dissociation</u> will immediately be dispelled.
670140.AbridgedEffect: When enemies enter battle, they have a chance to become afflicted with the <u>Dissociation</u> state. Enemies under <u>Dissociation</u> will become resistant to all DMG, and CRIT DMG and Break DMG taken are tallied. When this state is dispelled, deal a set amount of CRIT DMG based on the tallied value to all enemies.

670280.Name: Self-Proof Institute
670280.Effect: After <u>Suspicion</u> reaches <color=#f29e38ff>99</color> stacks, it will be consumed and turned into 1 stack of Self-Negation: Increases DoT dealt by the attacker by <color=#f29e38ff>70%</color>. Each stack additionally increases it by <color=#f29e38ff>10%</color>, stacking up to <color=#f29e38ff>50</color> time(s). At the start of an enemy's turn, they take Lightning DoT and cause adjacent targets to take Lightning DoT equal to <color=#f29e38ff>20%</color> of the original DMG multiplier. At <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> or more stacks: At the start of the turn, regenerates <color=#f29e38ff>20%</color> of <u>Brain in a Vat</u> for a random character. At <color=#f29e38ff>3</color> or more stacks: At the start of the turn, regenerates <color=#f29e38ff>10%</color> of <u>Brain in a Vat</u> for all allies.
670280.AbridgedEffect: When <u>Suspicion</u> reaches a certain number of stacks, it automatically becomes Self-Negation. On the basis of the Self-Negation stacks, increases the DoT dealt by the character, and recovers <u>Brain in a Vat</u> for the character and adjacent allied units based on the DMG they dealt at the start of the turn.

670350.Name: Borisin
670350.Effect: Flower of Annihilation appears in the Action Order. When <u>Dewdrop</u> breaks, it will Charge Flower of Annihilation by <color=#f29e38ff>550%</color> of the Dewdrop's charge. When Flower of Annihilation takes action, it deals Fire DMG to all enemies based on the Charge value. Every stack of <u>Grit</u> held by the team will additionally increase the DMG by <color=#f29e38ff>1.5%</color>.
670350.AbridgedEffect: A Flower of Annihilation appears in the Action Order. During its action, it deals DMG to all enemies. This DMG is affected by the characters' <u>Dewdrop</u> charge and <u>Grit</u> stacks.

670470.Name: Molten Knight
670470.Effect: After defeating an enemy target or Breaking an Elite Enemy's Weakness, the character will fire out a number of Lux Arrows equal to <color=#f29e38ff>5</color> plus the number of <u>Critical Boost</u> stacks to attack random enemies. Each Lux Arrow deals Additional DMG of the character's Type and applies <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> single <u>Spore</u> on the attacked target. While this effect is active, <u>Spores</u> can stack up to <color=#f29e38ff>99</color> times.
670470.AbridgedEffect: After defeating an enemy target or Breaking an Elite Enemy's Weakness, deal DMG to a random enemy target based on the number of <u>Critical Boost</u> stack(s) and apply <u>Spore</u> on attacked target(s).

670500.Name: Voyage Monitor
670500.Effect: After a character deals Break DMG, deal a set amount of Additional DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>100%</color> of the original damage after the attack. When a character's <u>Grit</u> reaches more than <color=#f29e38ff>30</color> stack(s), they gain a Shield equal to <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color> of their Max HP for <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> turn(s). After dealing Toughness-Reducing damage to all enemies, consume <color=#f29e38ff>20</color> stack(s) of <u>Grit</u>.
670500.AbridgedEffect: After a character deals Break DMG, deal DMG for 1 extra time. When a character's <u>Grit</u> is higher than a certain number of stacks, obtains a Shield. Then, deals DMG to all enemies by consuming <u>Grit</u>.

670630.Name: Advisor Physician
670630.Effect: DMG dealt by <u>Dewdrop</u> is regarded as follow-up attack DMG. After <u>Dewdrop</u> burst as a result of the character launching a follow-up attack or using an attack, there is a <color=#f29e38ff>12%</color> fixed chance every time for them to trigger the following effect: Charge <u>Dewdrop</u> for <color=#f29e38ff>80%</color> of its maximum, and deals DMG equal to 1/2/3/4 time(s) of <u>Dewdrop</u>'s Charge with a <color=#f29e38ff>15%</color>/<color=#f29e38ff>50%</color>/<color=#f29e38ff>30%</color>/<color=#f29e38ff>5%</color> fixed chance.
670630.AbridgedEffect: DMG from <u>Dewdrop</u> is considered as follow-up DMG. Triggering follow-up attacks or shattering <u>Dewdrops</u> has a chance to charge <u>Dewdrop</u> and additionally deal multiplied DMG.

670720.Name: Child of Calamity
670720.Effect: Enemy target obtains Borehole when entering battle: Borehole will record all <u>Spores</u> accumulated by the holder. After accumulating <color=#f29e38ff>18</color> Spores, the spores deal Quantum DMG to all enemies. For every debuff the enemy has, the DMG dealt increases by <color=#f29e38ff>10%</color>, up to <color=#f29e38ff>100%</color>. Then, the accumulated spores are cleared.
670720.AbridgedEffect: Enemy target obtains Borehole when entering battle: Borehole will record all <u>Spores</u> accumulated by the holder and deals Quantum DMG to all enemies. The more debuffs active, the higher the DMG.

670860.Name: Useless Scholar
670860.Effect: After the team uses a total of <color=#f29e38ff>6</color> Ultimate(s) while not under the Overclock effect, gains Overclock: After attacking with an Ultimate, deals <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>80%</color> of the attacker's ATK <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> time(s). After using an Ultimate, this status will end. The first character in the team lineup activates their Ultimate, Charges <u>Brain in a Vat</u> to <color=#f29e38ff>200%</color>, and uses Ultimate <color=#f29e38ff>3</color> times before the status ends on them.
670860.AbridgedEffect: Enters the Overclock state after all allies have used their Ultimates many times. While in this state, using Ultimates to attack will deal <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG, and the first character in the lineup will Charge <u>Brain in a Vat</u> by <color=#f29e38ff>200%</color> upon using their Ultimate.

671020.Name: The Pathless
671020.Effect: When the character deals <u>Quake</u> DMG, every type of DoT effect active on the enemy target will increase the current <u>Quake</u> DMG multiplier by <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color> of the original multiplier.
671020.AbridgedEffect: The more types of DoTs the enemy has, the higher the <u>Quake</u> DMG dealt to them by characters.

671030.Name: Ecological Administrator
671030.Effect: When characters deal <u>Quake</u> DMG, every character at Max HP will increase the current <u>Quake</u> DMG multiplier by <color=#f29e38ff>35%</color> of the original multiplier.
671030.AbridgedEffect: The more characters who have full HP, the higher the <u>Quake</u> DMG the characters deal.

671130.Name: Memory Doctor
671130.Effect: After a character launches an attack, <u>Dewdrop</u> will additionally deal <u>Dewdrop</u> DMG 1 time equal to <color=#f29e38ff>200%</color> of the original <u>Dewdrop</u> DMG multiplier to all Frozen enemy targets. Every Frozen enemy target additionally increases the DMG multiplier by <color=#f29e38ff>25%</color>.
671130.AbridgedEffect: After a character uses an attack, <u>Dewdrop</u> will additionally deal DMG to all Frozen enemy targets 1 time. The more enemy targets are Frozen, the higher the DMG.

671180.Name: Astral Computer
671180.Effect: When an enemy target leaves the Frozen state, all allies regenerate <color=#f29e38ff>4</color> Energy. When enemies' <u>Dissociation</u> state is dispelled, allies additionally regenerate <color=#f29e38ff>8</color> Energy.
671180.AbridgedEffect: When an enemy target leaves the Frozen state, all allies regenerate Energy. After enemies leave <u>Dissociation</u>, allies additionally regenerate Energy.

671210.Name: Sizzling Thunder
671210.Effect: When an enemy target becomes Frozen, causes all currently active DoT on the target to immediately deal DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>180%</color> of the original DMG. Each active DoT will apply 1 stack of <u>Suspicion</u>.
671210.AbridgedEffect: When an enemy target becomes Frozen, immediately triggers DoTs 1 time. Each DoT active on it will apply 1 stack of <u>Suspicion</u>.

671260.Name: Jester of Anatta
671260.Effect: When a character launches a follow-up attack, there is a <color=#f29e38ff>100%</color> base chance to apply 1 random debuff on the attacked target, lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> turn(s). The random debuffs include: Decrease DMG dealt by <color=#f29e38ff>15.0%</color>, decrease DEF by <color=#f29e38ff>30.0%</color>, and decrease SPD by <color=#f29e38ff>20.0%</color>.
671260.AbridgedEffect: After a character launches a follow-up attack, there is a high chance to inflict a random debuff to the target.

671340.Name: Eternal Stranger
671340.Effect: When <u>Dewdrop</u> Charges, for every 1% of CRIT Rate the character has, there is a <color=#f29e38ff>1%</color> fixed chance to increase the Charge value. The increased ratio equals to <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color> of the character's CRIT DMG.
671340.AbridgedEffect: When <u>Dewdrop</u> is charging, the charge value has a chance to CRIT.

671370.Name: Viscorpus
671370.Effect: Increases the maximum limit of <u>Dewdrop</u> by <color=#f29e38ff>75%</color>. When a character breaks <u>Dewdrop</u> by using their Basic ATK, restores <color=#f29e38ff>35%</color> of this <u>Dewdrop</u>'s Charge.
671370.AbridgedEffect: Increases maximum limit of <u>Dewdrop</u>. When a character breaks <u>Dewdrop</u> with their Basic ATK, restores part of <u>Dewdrop</u>'s Charge.

671400.Name: Disaster-Halting Mechanism
671400.Effect: When a character loses any Shield, increases their SPD by <color=#f29e38ff>12%</color>, lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> turn(s) and stacking up to <color=#f29e38ff>3</color> time(s). At the beginning of a character's next turn, they gain <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> stack(s) of <u>Critical Boost</u>.
671400.AbridgedEffect: When a character loses any Shield, increase their SPD, and they gain <u>Critical Boost</u> at the beginning of the next character's turn.

671460.Name: Bounty Hunter
671460.Effect: When a character deals CRIT DMG, there is a <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color> fixed chance to additionally deal CRIT DMG equal to a set amount (1‚Äì100%) of the original DMG for <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> times(s). This DMG is considered follow-up attack DMG.
671460.AbridgedEffect: When a character deals CRIT DMG, they have a chance to additionally deal CRIT DMG equal to a percentage of their original DMG. This DMG is considered a follow-up attack.

671510.Name: Memosnatcher
671510.Effect: When a character uses an attack that deals Ultimate DMG, consumes their HP equal to <color=#f29e38ff>20%</color> of their current HP. After this attack, there is a <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color> base chance to inflict Freeze on the attack target, lasting for<color=#f29e38ff>1</color> turn(s). Every stack of <u>Grit</u> increases the character's Effect Hit Rate by <color=#f29e38ff>2%</color>.
671510.AbridgedEffect: Characters' Ultimates consume HP and have a chance to inflict Freeze on the target. The more the <u>Grit</u> stacks they have, the higher the characters' Effect Hit Rate.

671520.Name: Wastelander
671520.Effect: After a character attacks a Weakness Broken enemy, converts the Toughness Reduction of the attack into 1 instance of <color=#f29e38ff>100%</color> <u>Super Break DMG</u>. After accumulating <color=#f29e38ff>30</color> stack(s) of <u>Grit</u>, additionally deals <color=#f29e38ff>100%</color> <u>Super Break DMG</u> caused by this effect.
671520.AbridgedEffect: When characters attack a Weakness Broken enemy target, deals <u>Super Break DMG</u>. After accumulating a number of <u>Grit</u> stacks, this <u>Super Break DMG</u> increases.

671650.Name: Firework Master
671650.Effect: After a character launches a follow-up attack, deals to the attacked enemy target <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>500%</color> of the total HP the character already lost 1 time. Then, clears the accumulated HP changes. HP change is accumulated up to <color=#f29e38ff>160%</color> of the character's Max HP.
671650.AbridgedEffect: After characters launch follow-up attacks, deals <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG based on the tallied HP they have lost.

671670.Name: Aether Phantom
671670.Effect: Increases max <u>Spores</u> to <color=#f29e38ff>5</color>. After characters launch a follow-up attack, apply <color=#f29e38ff>3</color> <u>Spore(s)</u> to the target.
671670.AbridgedEffect: Increases max <u>Spores</u> limit. When a character launches a follow-up attack, apply <u>Spores</u> to the attacked target.

671700.Name: Serf of Calamity
671700.Effect: When a character gains a Shield, causes <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> random enemy target(s) to gain 1 <u>Spore</u>. <u>Spore's</u> DMG multiplier increases by <color=#f29e38ff>75%</color> of the original multiplier.
671700.AbridgedEffect: When a character gains a Shield, cause random enemy targets to gain <u>Spore</u>. <u>Spore</u>'s DMG increases.

671780.Name: Deceiver of Calamity
671780.Effect: Increases max <u>Spores</u> by <color=#f29e38ff>3</color>. After a character uses an attack to deal Ultimate DMG and if the attacked target's <u>Spore</u> bursts, then additionally deal Ultimate DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>200%</color> of the character's ATK to the target. Every <u>Spore</u> burst by this attack increases this DMG multiplier by <color=#f29e38ff>30%</color>.
671780.AbridgedEffect: Increases max <u>Spores</u> limit. After Characters' Ultimate causes <u>Spores</u> to burst, deals Ultimate DMG to the attacked target 1 time. Every <u>Spore</u> burst will increase the DMG.

671840.Name: Silverheart Guards
671840.Effect: When a character defeats an enemy or Breaks their Weakness, charges <u>Brain in a Vat</u> by <color=#f29e38ff>25%</color> and also regenerates Energy equal to <color=#f29e38ff>10%</color> of Max Energy. If the target is an Elite Enemy, additionally regenerates Energy equal to <color=#f29e38ff>40%</color> of Max Energy.
671840.AbridgedEffect: When a character defeats an enemy or Breaks their Weakness, charges <u>Brain in a Vat</u> and regenerates Energy. If the target is an Elite Enemy, additionally regenerates Energy.

671850.Name: Anti-Organic Liquidator
671850.Effect: When a character uses an Ultimate, consumes HP from all allies equal to <color=#f29e38ff>5%</color> of their current HP and increases their DMG dealt by <color=#f29e38ff>30%</color> to a max of <color=#f29e38ff>4</color> stack(s), lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> turn(s).
671850.AbridgedEffect: When a character uses their Ultimate, all allies consume HP and increase DMG dealt.

672010.Name: Architect Scribe
672010.Effect: If a character attacks and inflicts Freeze on an enemy target, then all allies gain a Shield equal to <color=#f29e38ff>25%</color> of their respective Max HP, lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>3</color> turn(s). Every enemy target Frozen during this attack will increase the obtained Shield effect by <color=#f29e38ff>5%</color> of their respective Max HP.
672010.AbridgedEffect: When a character attacks and inflicts Freeze on an enemy target, all allies will gain a Shield. Every target Frozen during this attack will increase the Shield effect gained.

672050.Name: Unsinkable
672050.Effect: When a character receives a Shield, for every 1% of HP that is different between the character's Max HP and current HP, the Shield effect increases by <color=#f29e38ff>1.0%</color>.
672050.AbridgedEffect: When a character receives a Shield, the higher the difference between the character's Max HP and current HP, the higher the Shield effect.

672060.Name: Dreamweaver
672060.Effect: When a character launches a follow-up attack, deals <u>Quake</u> DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>360%</color> of the character's current Shield effect to the attacked target(s).
672060.AbridgedEffect: After a character launches a follow-up attack, deals <u>Quake</u> DMG based on the current Shield effect.

672100.Name: Scholar of Candles
672100.Effect: When a character takes fatal DMG, their HP will become 1, and they will obtain a Shield equal to <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color> of their Max HP before entering a Freeze state that cannot be dispelled, lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>3</color> turn(s). While in this state, their HP cannot be restored, and taking fatal DMG again will dispel this state and cause the character to be downed.
672100.AbridgedEffect: When characters take fatal DMG, they will not be knocked down. Instead, they will gain a Shield and become Frozen.

672160.Name: Biographer
672160.Effect: After a character attacks a Frozen target, deals <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG 1 time equal to <color=#f29e38ff>180%</color> of the character's ATK to the target.
672160.AbridgedEffect: After a character attacks a Frozen target, deals <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG.

672180.Name: Armed Archaeologist Team
672180.Effect: After an enemy target becomes Frozen, increase the Ultimate DMG they receive by <color=#f29e38ff>60%</color>. This effect will last for <color=#f29e38ff>2</color> turn(s) after Freeze is dispelled.
672180.AbridgedEffect: When an enemy target becomes Frozen, increases the Ultimate DMG they receive. This effect will endure for a number of turns even after they are no longer Frozen.

672200.Name: Night Watch
672200.Effect: When the enemy target enters battle, they are inflicted with the Bleed effect. While Bleeding, they will take Physical DoT equal to <color=#f29e38ff>10%</color> of their Max HP at the start of their turn. This DMG cannot exceed <color=#f29e38ff>650%</color> of all allies' total Shield effect.
672200.AbridgedEffect: When enemy targets enter the battle, they are afflicted with Bleed. DMG dealt by Bleed is based on the total sum of Shield on all allies.

672240.Name: Sin Thirster
672240.Effect: Characters' DoT can cause CRIT Hit. When dealing DoT, CRIT DMG cannot exceed <color=#f29e38ff>100%</color>.
672240.AbridgedEffect: Characters' DoT can CRIT Hit. CRIT DMG is capped.

672280.Name: Common Mortal
672280.Effect: When an enemy target is defeated, every stack of <u>Suspicion</u> they had will regenerate <color=#f29e38ff>0.30</color> of Energy for all allies.
672280.AbridgedEffect: When an enemy target is defeated, all allies regenerate Energy based on the <u>Suspicion</u> stacks on it.

672340.Name: Wingweaver
672340.Effect: When an enemy target is defeated, increase the Charging Efficiency of <u>Dewdrop</u> by <color=#f29e38ff>10%</color> up to a maximum of <color=#f29e38ff>10</color> stack(s). Also restores HP for all allies equal to <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color> of their respective Max HP.
672340.AbridgedEffect: When an enemy target is defeated, increases the Charging Efficiency of <u>Dewdrop</u>. Also, restores HP for all allies.

672350.Name: Houyhnhnm
672350.Effect: Every stack of <u>Grit</u> a character has will increase their Incoming Healing by <color=#f29e38ff>2%</color>.
672350.AbridgedEffect: The higher the <u>Grit</u> stacks are, the higher the character's HP recovery is increased.

672370.Name: Symbiote
672370.Effect: Increases character's HP restoration by <color=#f29e38ff>35%</color>. After healing allies, there is a <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color> fixed chance to recover 1 Skill Point. This effect can trigger 1 time per character action.
672370.AbridgedEffect: Increases characters' HP recovery. Has a chance of recovering Skill Points after healing an allied target.

672400.Name: Borderstar Gunslinger
672400.Effect: After a character is attacked and if they did not take DMG from this attack, they will only lose <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> stack(s) of <u>Critical Boost</u>.
672400.AbridgedEffect: When a character is attacked and does not take DMG, they will only lose a small amount of <u>Critical Boost</u>.

672410.Name: Amnesiac
672410.Effect: When a character deals DMG to a Frozen enemy target, each stack of <u>Critical Boost</u> additionally increases CRIT Rate by <color=#f29e38ff>4%</color> and CRIT DMG by <color=#f29e38ff>30%</color>.
672410.AbridgedEffect: When a character deals DMG to a Frozen enemy target, each stack of <u>Critical Boost</u> additionally increases CRIT Rate and CRIT DMG.

672430.Name: Pacifist
672430.Effect: When a character's turn begins, every stack of <u>Critical Boost</u> they have will restore their HP equal to <color=#f29e38ff>5%</color> of their Max HP, and restore HP to allies equal to <color=#f29e38ff>2%</color> of their respective Max HP.
672430.AbridgedEffect: When a character's turn begins, restore all allies' HP based on the number of <u>Critical Boost</u> stacks they have.

672520.Name: Walker of the Scorched
672520.Effect: When a character has <u>Grit</u>, increases their All-Type RES PEN by <color=#f29e38ff>15%</color>. Each stack of <u>Grit</u> a character has will increase their Break Effect by <color=#f29e38ff>3%</color>.
672520.AbridgedEffect: When a character has <u>Grit</u>, increases their All-Type RES PEN. Each stack of <u>Grit</u> a character has will increase their Break Effect.

672530.Name: Pyromaniac
672530.Effect: Each stack of <u>Grit</u> increases the character's Max HP by <color=#f29e38ff>6%</color>, but Maximum Restorable HP will be reduced to <color=#f29e38ff>80%</color> of the additional Max HP.
672530.AbridgedEffect: Each stack of <u>Grit</u> increases the characters' Max HP, but reduces Maximum Restorable HP.

672580.Name: Firesmith
672580.Effect: Increases characters' Ultimate DMG dealt by <color=#f29e38ff>60%</color>. Every 1% of HP a character loses will Charge <u>Brain in a Vat</u> by <color=#f29e38ff>0.5%</color>.
672580.AbridgedEffect: Increases characters' Ultimate DMG. Charges <u>Brain in a Vat</u> when characters lose HP.

672620.Name: Candy Knight
672620.Effect: Characters' <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG applies Toughness Reduction of the corresponding Type. If this effect breaks an enemy's Weakness, triggers the Weakness Break effect of the attacker's Type.
672620.AbridgedEffect: Characters' <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG reduces Toughness of the corresponding Type.

672630.Name: Drifting Circus
672630.Effect: Every time characters deal <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG, their Max HP increases by <color=#f29e38ff>5%</color>, up to a max of <color=#f29e38ff>15</color> stack(s) and lasting for <color=#f29e38ff>1</color> turn(s).
672630.AbridgedEffect: The more hits of <u>Aftertaste</u> DMG triggered by characters, the higher their Max HP become.

672670.Name: Balloon Merchant
672670.Effect: Increases the follow-up attack DMG dealt by characters by <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color>. After launching a follow-up attack, there is a <color=#f29e38ff>100%</color> fixed chance to recover 1 Skill Point.
672670.AbridgedEffect: Increases the follow-up attack DMG dealt by characters. After launching a follow-up attack, recovers Skill Points.

672710.Name: Phantom Worker
672710.Effect: Reduces enemies' Effect RES by <color=#f29e38ff>10%</color> for each <u>Spore</u> stack they have.
672710.AbridgedEffect: The more <u>Spore</u> stacks enemy targets have, the lower their Effect RES becomes.

672720.Name: Afterglow Worker
672720.Effect: Increases <u>Spore's</u> DMG multiplier by <color=#f29e38ff>60%</color> of the original multiplier. When Spores burst, the DMG multiplier increases additionally by <color=#f29e38ff>3%</color> of the original multiplier for each debuff the enemy target has.
672720.AbridgedEffect: Increases <u>Spore</u>'s DMG. When Spores burst, the DMG increases additionally for each debuff the enemy target has.

672750.Name: Starcrusher Worker
672750.Effect: When a character uses a Basic ATK and their HP percentage is larger than or equal to <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color>, consumes HP equal to <color=#f29e38ff>5%</color> of their Max HP and additionally recovers 1 Skill Point.
672750.AbridgedEffect: When a character uses a Basic ATK and their HP percentage is larger than or equal to <color=#f29e38ff>50%</color>, they consume HP and additionally recover Skill Points.

672840.Name: Penman
672840.Effect: After a character attacks and deals Ultimate DMG, every enemy target hit will deal Ultimate DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff>100%</color> of the character's ATK to the enemy target with the highest Max HP.
672840.AbridgedEffect: For every enemy target a character's Ultimate hits, deals Ultimate DMG to the enemy target with the highest Max HP.

672860.Name: Repairman
672860.Effect: Increases characters' Ultimate DMG by <color=#f29e38ff>60%</color>. After triggering a follow-up attack, every enemy target hit by the attack will make the next Ultimate ignore <color=#f29e38ff>5%</color> of the enemy targets' DEF, stacking up to <color=#f29e38ff>5</color> time(s).
672860.AbridgedEffect: Increases a character's Ultimate DMG. After using a follow-up attack, every enemy target hit will additionally let the next Ultimate ignore target's DEF.

672870.Name: Kolchis
672870.Effect: Every Skill Point characters consume increases Ultimate DMG dealt by <color=#f29e38ff>45%</color>, up to a max of <color=#f29e38ff>135%</color> and lasting until after using the Ultimate.
672870.AbridgedEffect: The more Skill Points characters consume, the more Ultimate DMG they deal.
